meanings.definition: The state of being restless or unable to sit still.
meanings.sent1: Her fidgetiness during the movie made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent2: The child's fidgetiness in class was a distraction to others.
meanings.sent3: His fidgetiness at the doctor's office was quite amusing to the other patients.
meanings.sent4: The fidgetiness of the squirrel as it searched for nuts was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The fidgetiness of the puppy was endearing to everyone who saw it.

meanings.definition: The act of constantly moving or shifting position.
meanings.sent1: The fidgetiness of the dancer added energy to the performance.
meanings.sent2: His fidgetiness during the meeting was a sign of his nervousness.
meanings.sent3: The fidgetiness of the cat chasing its tail was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The fidgetiness of the wind as it rustled the leaves was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The fidgetiness of the toddler as she explored the playground was adorable.
